original_text: And Moses came and spake all the words of this song in the ears of the people, he, and Hoshea the son of Nun.
korean_text: 모세와 눈의 아들 호세아가 와서 이 노래의 모든 말씀을 백성에게 말하여 들리니라

sentences.original_text: and spake all the words of this song
in the ears of the people
he, and Hoshea the son of Nun
